app_review: Does not want to work, I'm getting a strange message about changes to my phone and to contact customer service. Please advice on this matter.

app_review: I bought this thinking i could use this for open water swimming. Far from efficient, as i couldnt close the app after i finished. Would have been great to have been able to tell the actual water temp too. Also the sleep function is ineffective.

app_review: I like this app. It does everything I need it to do with the exception of a barcode scanner for the "eat healthier" program or at least let me import scan data from another app to this one

app_review: Not always do I take my phone, I wish the app still allowed us to put ours steps in from our other devices not supported.

app_review: Add Tecno mobile features in this app. I've band 6 and I'm having identification error

app_review: Overall quite a good app but needs to be a little easier to access the settings section...
user_story: As a user, I want the settings section to be easily accessible so that I can customize the app to my preferences.

app_review: Settings is enabled but kept asking sms permission on my s7, hence couldn't connect with my friends who has S health.

app_review: Disappointed with this app. No way to install additional watch faces unless you download the moded chinese version. Why is this app not regularly updated?

app_review: I used to love this app.. now it dosent even work properly. It dosent even count my steps sometime.. really frustrating, also weight management feature is no longer there with the new update.. pointless having this app anymore..

app_review: Does the job. But my floor count is so inaccurate the last 4 weeks. Vivosmart keeps saying I've climed 35+ floors everyday when its more like 10-15 floor.

app_review: My activities from My Fitness Pal don't sync into the Connect app. I'm having to enter my workouts manually.  My information such as my picture or personal stats/settings are saving some and not others. My screens look nothing like any of the screenshots or videos.

Additionally, I want all my personal information, including my picture and stats, to save correctly and accurately reflect on all screens as shown in the screenshots and videos."

app_review: Aftsr latest update gt2 doesnt connect to internet. Cannot show weather data and cant check for update... Also cant change watch faces. Also probkems in help page... Simply notngood

app_review: I have installed and uninstalled this app 12 times and it still doesnt work. When I click on 'Sign in' it just goes blank. I have watched the Youtube trouble shooting tutorials also. Does not work.

app_review: Im often using this apps for physical activity daily drive.... But the result was not significant ... Long run about 45 minutes.... And the result. 51% walk.. 49% running...for 8 kilometres... Even im not using this phone for a day.... Yhe result always look like the same....

app_review: Tries to open files associated with other apps. Garmin is clueless about how their app behaves. Very virus-like activity.
user_story:
Here is an example of converting an assistant review into a user story:

Review: "The assistant constantly forgets my preferences and gives me irrelevant suggestions."  
User Story: "As an assistant user, I want the app to remember my preferences and provide relevant suggestions so that I can easily find what I need."

app_review: App is great overall, but I would like a way to see the evelation of the route I made. Also, there's no way to add faces to the Band 4 Pro.

I also want the app to have a smooth sync process and effective tech support to resolve any issues. app_review: After updating app, it's not connecting, even it's not showing device, then i thought i have to reset it (Honor band5), then also not connecting, worst experience, worst app. Now this band became useless. You Busted why you people taking money from us.

app_review: Some minor issues found in your app.  If i shake my phone it count steps.  Plz fix this issue and it would be a good app for health.

app_review: Only complaint is when watch disconnects' becasue i got too far from phone (30+') it wont automatically reconnect...other then that still learning so hope to rate higher then 3â˜† later

app_review: App looks good but the settings don't take effect immediately, setting profile specific information

app_review: the app don't pair with my forerunner 35 on Huawei P8 lite 2017 and android 7 whereas the previous version did, very frustrating?

app_review: Improve ur app man and add some more features to smartwatch ui it getting boring add camera shutter and voice assistant and add feature to stop continues heart rate monitor change navigation animation and add drink water reminder etc

I also want it to have options to stop continuous heart rate monitoring, change navigation animations, and add a drink water reminder. This will make using the app more enjoyable and useful for me.

app_review: Why did you take away the average weight stats for weekly and monthly. Now I can only see daily. Worst update ever. Now I will have to find another app with those features!

This feature was previously available and its removal has made the app less useful. I would like the feature to be reinstated or find another app that offers this feature."

app_review: The sleep app is not updating on my android phone. It suddenly stopped. The watch Huawei GT 2 is good. But there seems to be bug in the App.

app_review: Used my vivofit for over a year and app worked just fine but now since recent updates I can no longer synch my vivofit to any of my mobile devices.  If this continues I will move on to another brand of fitness tracker.

app_review: The unit does not allow changing to S.I. units (kJ instead of kcal) and has only U.S. food preprogrammed. The option to enter your own food is gone since the latest update. It is pretty useless now. And Samsung never replies to questions or suggestions.

app_review: This is a bad app, it doesn't count your steps correctly and it closes by itself.

app_review: The app in my S6 has more features, where is the heart rate and spo2  measures now?

app_review: Where is the oxygen monitor that was advertised on the Samsung galaxy watch 3? That was half the reason I bought it...

app_review: First use - update failed, cannot add smart band. Device is useless. Great gift, lamers

app_review: Requirement for Huawei mobile services has ruined the Health app and won't allow access

app_review: Sleep tracking stopped syncing on new years eve. Don't know why, but since 1-1 2020 it doesn't work anymore. Fix this please
user_story: As a user, I want the sleep tracking feature to continue syncing after New Year's Eve, to ensure consistent data for my sleep tracking statistics.

app_review: So many watch faces to choose, but none of them are digital WITH seconds counter. Even the simplest design would be sufficient. Otherwise works well, not intrusive and overall nice app.
user_story: User Story: "As a user, I want the app to have a digital watch face with a seconds counter so that I can easily tell the time accurately. Even a basic design would be satisfactory. Additionally, the app should have a simple and non-intrusive design for a pleasant user experience."

app_review: Excellent ðŸ‘Œ App. Would be 5 stars if there were paid watch faces and more free ones..Also, limited exercise options available compared to those on Huawei GT2 & GT2 Pro watch
user_story: User Story: As a user, I want the option to purchase paid watch faces on the app so that I have a wider variety of choices. Additionally, I want to see an increase in the number of free watch faces available. Furthermore, I would like to have more exercise options similar to those available on the Huawei GT2 and GT2 Pro watches.

app_review: You are missing one component that is very user friendly. Being able to scan barcodes, so that entering a meal or snack is quicker.
user_story: As a user, I want to be able to scan barcodes to quickly enter meals and snacks into the app, so that the process is more efficient and user-friendly.

app_review: Great app. A scanner feature would be useful for enter food calories..
user_story: As a user, I want a scanner feature in the app so that I can easily enter food calories by scanning barcodes or taking photos of the food.

app_review: Why is there no option to find my band? Why can't open while we're are offline

app_review: It won't let me connect my watch to my tablet.
user_story: As a user, I want to be able to connect my watch to my tablet so that I can easily view and track my fitness data on a larger screen.

app_review: Not very accurate will not sink - MyFitnessPal would not buy again. Mobile app error all the time.
user_story: As a user, I want the MyFitnessPal app to accurately record my food and exercise input so that I can effectively track my progress. Additionally, I want the mobile app to function smoothly without frequent errors so that I can easily use it on the go. I would not consider purchasing the app again if these issues persist.

app_review: Heart Rate monitoring has been made redundant. Can't see it in real time. Post the latest update, this has really lost its utility.
user_story: As a user, I want the app to display my heart rate in real time so that I can monitor it effectively and see its current status.

app_review: When incoming call arrives on my band it displays half number instead of full number (honor band 6). Please update as soon as possible and if i turn off location band automatically got disconnected.
user_story: User Story: "As a band user, I want incoming calls to display the full number instead of half numbers on my Honor Band 6. Additionally, the band should remain connected even if I turn off my location."

app_review: You got rid of the one measurement I used. I have severe asthma and used the oxygen measurements for my doctor and myself. The stress one takes much longer and doesn't track it...
user_story: User Story: "As a user with severe asthma, I need the app's oxygen measurement feature to be available so that I can track and share this information with my doctor and myself."

app_review: Always shows as running in the background since latest update, please fix! even after latest update says it is using battery
user_story: User Story: "As a user, I want the app to stop running in the background after the latest update so that it doesn't continue to use battery power unnecessarily."

app_review: Excellent for cycling, wizh it had greater flexibility in logging strength workouts, unable to write in different exercises
user_story: As a user, I want the app to have greater flexibility in logging my strength workouts so that I can record different exercises in addition to cycling.

app_review: Bluetooth connection getting lost, not loading with recent update. No login was required earlier, now it's asking for that, don't understand the logic.
user_story: User Story: As a user, I want the Bluetooth connection to stay connected even after updating the app so that I can continue using it without interruptions. Additionally, I want the app to remember my previous login session so that I'm not constantly asked to log in.

app_review: Pretty good app. Keeps me honest. Could always use more food/ nutrition counts, exercises and would like to see it get a bit smarter. Lots of repetitive messages.
user_story: As a user, I want the app to provide more food/nutrition counts and exercises, and to become smarter, so that I can have a better understanding of my health and progress. Additionally, I would like to reduce the number of repetitive messages in the app.

app_review: I do love this app. Would be better if Fitbit was a partner app as i feel  that would track my steps better as my phone isnt on me contantly
user_story: User Story: "As a user, I want the app to partner with Fitbit so that my steps can be more accurately tracked, even when my phone is not on me."

app_review: Update ruined everything. My data is lost. Rubbish syncing and never updates my steps anymore. Disconnects every few minutes and counts nap when I'm awake. I thought it's firmware issue but turns it it's just this garbage app.
user_story: As an assistant, I want the app to reliably sync my steps and ensure my data is not lost so that I can accurately track my activity and progress. Additionally, I want the app to stay connected and accurately track my steps even if I disconnect for a few minutes.

app_review: step count is not correct but it was never a issue for me if it is 2 - 4% but in running its sarting with 10 to 15 % less secount while running scren geting off as normal app which is irritating.
user_story: As a user, I want the step count to be accurate so that I can track my progress accurately while using the app for running. I also want the screen to stay on and not go off randomly, as it is annoying and affects my experience with the app.

app_review: I work a 12 hr shift and i walk 10 of those hours.  This doesn't count all of my steps. Not happy about the way it shows your rewards. Won't let you see each reward. Before update was better. Not excited about using this anymore.
user_story: As a user who works a 12-hour shift and walks 10 hours during that time, I want the app to accurately track all of my steps so that I can see my progress accurately. I also want to be able to view each individual reward and feel excited about using the app again.

app_review: Did not want this. Cannot delete it. Cannot even turn out off. Google, block this app!
user_story: As a user, I want to be able to delete this app and turn off any notifications to avoid being bothered.

app_review: This was a great app however no update in recent times, need auto pause feature Most of the apps support auto pause n start feature, will appreciate more sporty interface.
user_story: As a user, I want the app to have an auto pause feature so that I can easily pause and start the app without manually stopping and restarting it. Additionally, I would like the interface to have a more sporty look and feel.

app_review: After the last update I cannot pair my weight scale with the app. It stops at a message like :Huawei Health wants to access servers in Mainland to download files... Etc. Even if I press allow its not working and the message appears again and again.
user_story: As a user, I want to be able to pair my weight scale with the app after updating it, so that I can track my weight accurately and easily without any errors or interruptions.

app_review: It's great now. Love. Just wish you could pause the run instead of stopping it, or is there a way to pause without stopping it?
user_story:
Other possible user story:
"As a runner, I want to pause my run without stopping the tracking, so that I can take a short break and resume with accurate tracking."

app_review: App can't connect to the watch. Since the last update it is even worse.
user_story: User Story: "As an assistant, I want the app to be able to consistently connect to my watch so that I can use it for my daily tasks without any interruptions caused by updates."

app_review: Works great with z5 and my forerunner 230. No issues with connection between the two at all. Sometimes sleep tracking can be a little inaccurate but not by much. There has never been a problem syncing with strava, can't comment on mapmyfitness unfortunately as I don't use it yet.
user_story: User Story: "As a user who uses the app with a z5 and forerunner 230, I want the connection between the two devices to work seamlessly and accurately. Additionally, I would like the app to support syncing with Strava and MapMyFitness for a more comprehensive tracking experience."

app_review: Since the latest update my device won't connect with my phone
user_story: User Story: "As a user, I want the latest update to allow my device to connect with my phone again so that I can use it seamlessly."

app_review: Update: new update fixed it Old: Your update just made Health device useless
user_story: As a user of the Health device, I want the new update to fix any issues that made it unusable so that I can continue using it effectively.
